content.question: Interpretations of Locke’s assertions regarding a “state of freedom” and a “state also of equality” most directly influenced which of the following?

choices.label: The grievances of American colonists during the Seven Years’ War (French and Indian War)
The political rhetoric of Patriots during the American Revolution
The end of American involvement in the international slave trade
The demands by colonists to settle beyond the current frontier boundaries

content.answer: The political rhetoric of Patriots during the American Revolution

topic.text: 3.4: Philosophical Foundations of the American Revolution

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
